## Instructors

[Dr. Andrew Ellis](mailto:andrew.ellis@bfh.ch) is a cognitive psychologist and research associate at the [Virtual Academy](https://virtuelleakademie.ch/) of Bern University of Applied Sciences. His research focuses on human learning processes and the cognitive impacts of AI-assisted education.

[Dr. Stefan Hackstein](mailto:stefan.hackstein@bfh.ch) is a physicist and data scientist working as a research associate at the Virtual Academy of Bern University of Applied Sciences. He specializes in developing AI-powered educational tools and analyzing their effectiveness in learning environments.

Together, they investigate how artificial intelligence can be thoughtfully integrated into educational systems to enhance rather than replace human cognitive engagement.
